name: machine-native-ops-root
description: Root helper package.json for CI/Cloudflare builds

scripts.build: npm ci --prefix workspace/src/frontend/ui && npm run build --prefix workspace/src/frontend/ui && rm -rf dist && cp -a workspace/src/frontend/ui/dist ./dist && cp -a cloudflare/pages/_headers dist/_headers && cp -a cloudflare/pages/_redirects dist/_redirects
